summary: A house 10 thousand kilometers away from Buenos Aires, inhabited by a former president ousted and exiled by his wife and future president, and secretary. Which it was the heart and brain of resistance and struggle of an entire people.
cast: Víctor Laplace|Victoria Carreras|Estanislao Corvalán|Adolfo Yanelli|Natalia Mateo|Guillermo Aguilar|Germán Romero|Daniel Di Biase|Claudio Torres|Laura González|Fernando Álvarez|Emiliano Díaz|Odón Morán López|Alejandro Carro|Joaquín Di Lascio|Javier Lombardo|Julio Marticorena|Federico Luppi|Eugenia Lencinas|Ramiro Robino|Marcelo D'Andrea|Jimena La Torre|Chucho Fernández|Iván Moschner|Joan Ferrer|Alejandro Serra|Silvia Hilario|Federico Barroso|Sergio Surraco|Gustavo Chantada|Andrés Field|Néstor Zacco|Manuel Vicente|Enrique Barris|Andres Aramburu|Ariel Nuñez Di Croce|Hugo Fontana|Gustavo Garzón|Julio Lester|Horacio Marassi|Alfredo Sánchez|Iván Steinhardt|Hernán Liggeri
keywords: based on true events|based on real people|seven word title|what happened to epilogue|ends with biographical notes
title: Puerta de Hierro, el exilio de Perón
